alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:47AM CDT until June 29 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Coles County in east central Illinois... Southwestern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northwestern Clark County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Cumberland County in east central Illinois... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 647 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rardin, or near Charleston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ashmore around 700 AM CDT. Kansas around 705 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Westfield. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 127 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
